titles.title: A bill to amend section 108(f) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the tax treatment of discharges of indebtedness under certain student loans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1474-1475)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include under the program for discharge of indebtedness for student loans any loan to an individual made by a State which had no accredited professional schools for the study of law or medicine, if the individual resided for a period of time in the State after completion of attendance at the educational organization.
